comment._content:
Other Bain/LOC photos of former President Theodore Roosevelt in South America:

The Butantan Institute was founded in 1901 (after an outbreak of bubonic plague) to facilitate medical research. In May of this year (2010) the Institute was devastated by a fire that destroyed its collections of venemous snakes and spiders.

[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4818005543/in/photostream/]
